name: Cosmic Defenders (itch) (TK Creations, JackLuxon, blubbers122, Extroias)
name_original: Cosmic Defenders (itch) (TK Creations, JackLuxon, blubbers122, Extroias)
description:
Story

Enemy aliens have appeared all across the galaxy and are attacking planets without warning and plundering their resources and destroying planets. This has caused a side effect called Cosmic Intervention, which is an unpredictable phenomenon plaguing the entire galaxy. To counter this, various planets have formed an alliance called the Cosmic Defenders, who travel from planet to planet fending off the hostile aliens. However with the enemy having large numbers and the unpredictability of Cosmic Intervention, the Cosmic Defenders must use their wits and resources to successfully fend off the aliens and avoid planetary catastrophe.

Controls

Use the mouse click to select which units to deploy on land as well as upgrading, moving and removing them.

WASD - Control the game’s camera to look around the map.

P, Escape - Cause the Pause Menu to appear.

Mouse Wheel - Zoom in and out the map.
